ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A dataset with an uneven number of cases in each class is said to be unbalanced. Many models produce a subpar performance on unbalanced datasets. A dataset can be balanced by increasing the number of minority cases using SMOTE 2011 <arXiv:1106.1813>, BorderlineSMOTE 2005 <doi:10.1007/11538059_91> and ADASYN 2008 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4633969>. Or by decreasing the number of majority cases using NearMiss 2003 <https://www.site.uottawa.ca/~nat/Workshop2003/jzhang.pdf> or Tomek link removal 1976 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4309452>.

A dataset with an uneven number of cases in each class is said to be unbalanced. Many models produce a subpar performance on unbalanced datasets. A dataset can be balanced by increasing the number of minority cases using SMOTE 2011 <arXiv:1106.1813>, BorderlineSMOTE 2005 <doi:10.1007/11538059_91> and ADASYN 2008 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4633969>. Or by decreasing the number of majority cases using NearMiss 2003 <https://www.site.uottawa.ca/~nat/Workshop2003/jzhang.pdf> or Tomek link removal 1976 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4309452>.

name: r-themis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-themis
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/themis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/themis/themis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0bcb44ea252eef06f6df739fe03fdc3b1a464cb6d6172c1fcbffdc1f6fda718d

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rann
    - r-rose
    - r-dials
    - r-dplyr
    - r-generics
    - r-purrr
    - r-recipes >=0.1.4
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble
    - r-unbalanced
    - r-withr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rann
    - r-rose
    - r-dials
    - r-dplyr
    - r-generics
    - r-purrr
    - r-recipes >=0.1.4
    - r-rlang
    - r-tibble
    - r-unbalanced
    - r-withr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('themis')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('themis')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/tidymodels/themis
  license: MIT
  summary: A dataset with an uneven number of cases in each class is said to be unbalanced. Many models produce a subpar performance on unbalanced datasets. A dataset can be balanced by increasing the number of minority cases using SMOTE 2011 <arXiv:1106.1813>, BorderlineSMOTE 2005 <doi:10.1007/11538059_91> and ADASYN 2008
    <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4633969>. Or by decreasing the number of majority cases using NearMiss 2003 <https://www.site.uottawa.ca/~nat/Workshop2003/jzhang.pdf> or Tomek link removal 1976 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4309452>.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: themis
# Title: Extra Recipes Steps for Dealing with Unbalanced Data
# Version: 0.1.1
# Authors@R: person(given = "Emil", family = "Hvitfeldt", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "emilhhvitfeldt@gmail.com", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-0679-1945"))
# Description: A dataset with an uneven number of cases in each class is said to be unbalanced. Many models produce a subpar performance on unbalanced datasets. A dataset can be balanced by increasing the number of minority cases using SMOTE 2011 <arXiv:1106.1813>, BorderlineSMOTE 2005 <doi:10.1007/11538059_91> and ADASYN 2008 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4633969>. Or by decreasing the number of majority cases using NearMiss 2003 <https://www.site.uottawa.ca/~nat/Workshop2003/jzhang.pdf> or Tomek link removal 1976 <https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4309452>.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/tidymodels/themis
# BugReports: https://github.com/tidymodels/themis/issues
# Depends: R (>= 2.10), recipes (>= 0.1.4)
# Imports: dials, dplyr, generics, purrr, RANN, rlang, ROSE, tibble, unbalanced, withr
# Suggests: covr, ggplot2, modeldata, testthat (>= 2.1.0)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0.9000
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-05-16 03:47:51 UTC; emilhvitfeldthansen
# Author: Emil Hvitfeldt [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0679-1945>)
# Maintainer: Emil Hvitfeldt <emilhhvitfeldt@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-05-17 07:30:02 UTC
